messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Samir, and I have to do a research project for
school. I hope you wouldn't mind if I asked you guys some
questions for my survey. By the way, I am doing my project on if
the samurai legacy still lives on in modern Japan.

Thanks,
Samir
